widget.name: Image Viewer Resource
widget.description: View an image from your xcode or android studio bundle

property.caption: Resource Name
property.description: name of the resource. For iOS: this is the relative path to the resource (including file extension) E.g. MyAssets/mygif.gif. For Android, this is the name of the file in the app/src/main/res/drawable folder. On Android only, values entered here will be converted to lowercase and '/' characters will be replaced with '_'s. E.g. myassets_mygif.gif. See the documentation for more info.
